extracted_playbook.title: Use within a LAN and block access from untrusted networks
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the system to operate within a Local Area Network (LAN) and use firewalls to block access from untrusted networks and hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict physical access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict physical access to the product, as well as to computers and network devices located within the same network as the product.

extracted_playbook.title: Use firewall or VPN for Internet access
extracted_playbook.description: Use a firewall or virtual private network (VPN) to prevent unauthorized access when Internet access is required.

extracted_playbook.title: Use IP filter function
extracted_playbook.description: Use the IP filter function to block access from untrusted hosts. Refer to the MELSEC iQ-F FX5 OPC UA Module User's Manual '4.4 IP Filter' for details.

extracted_playbook.title: Do not import untrusted certificates
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid importing untrusted certificates to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize network exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform impact analysis and risk assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report suspected malicious activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
